==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|にん|yomi=o}}
From [[小]] (''shō'', "small," "little") + [[人]] (''nin'', "human being")

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょうにん}}

# [[child]], [[small]] [[person]]

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|大人|おとな}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|こ|ひと|k2=びと|yomi=k|r=y}}
From [[小]] (''ko'', "small," "little") + [[人]] (''hito'', "man"). The word ''hito'' changes to ''bito'' due to [[rendaku]].

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こびと}}

# [[dwarf]]

=====Antonyms=====
* {{ja-r|巨人|きょじん}}

===Etymology 3===

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょうじん}}

# [[narrow-minded]] person, [[mean]] person
